title: Amazon's new Fire 7 tablet improves slightly, keeps low price
description:
Full review: http://cnet.co/2r6gUyC
A bit thinner, lighter and featuring improved battery life, Amazon's entry-level Fire is a decent bargain at $50, especially for Prime members.
